content:
# Factorio Report

## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Furnace at position (1.0, 1.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace (position (1.0, 1.0))

### Copper plate mine at position (-28.5, -61.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position (-28.5, -61.5))

### Coal mine at position (40.5, -82.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position (40.5, -82.5))

### Wooden chests
Consists of the following entities:
- Wooden chest (position (3.5, 1.5))
- Wooden chest (position (3.5, 3.5))
- Wooden chest (position (3.5, 5.5))

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when inserting items into the furnace
- Ensure you have the required items in your inventory before attempting to insert them into the furnace. You encountered multiple errors indicating that you tried to insert copper ore when it was not available in your inventory.

### Errors when extracting items from the furnace
- Ensure that the furnace contains the item you are trying to extract. You received errors indicating that there was no copper ore in the furnace when attempting to extract it.

### Errors when placing entities
- Ensure you have the required entity in your inventory before attempting to place it. You encountered an error when trying to place an electric mining drill without having one in your inventory.

### Errors when crafting items
- Ensure you have the necessary resources and machines to craft items. You received errors indicating that you could not craft items due to missing resources or machines.

### Errors when inserting coal into the furnace
- Ensure you have coal in your inventory before attempting to insert it into the furnace. You encountered errors indicating that there was no coal available when trying to insert it.
